row.scheme: ;;;ScoreDedication (if (d-PreviousMovement) (d-WarningDialog "Returning to the first Movement to set this.")) (while (d-PreviousMovement) (display "Seeking first movement")) (SetHeaderField "dedication") (DenemoPrintAllHeaders) (d-RefreshDisplay)
row._tooltip: The dedicatee of the music, centered at the top of the first page.
